Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with balcony, fully equipped kitchen with a stove, refrigerator, coffee maker, microwave, safe, telephone. Massage, Laundry Service, 24-Hour Front Desk, Grounds, Lift/elevator, Safe, Soundproof Rooms, Baggage Storage.
Important place or monument close to the hotel: located on the South East Coast of Chios Island, on the heart of Karfas Bay, Town - 7km. Airport - 5km.
